text: A Warning (Výstraha) is a 1953 Czechoslovak drama film, directed by Miroslav Cikán. It stars Jiří Dohnal, Josef Mixa, and Vladimír Petruška. ==References== ==External links== *A Warning (Výstraha) at the Internet Movie Database Category:1953 films Category:Czechoslovak films Category:Czechoslovak drama films Category:1953 drama films Category:Films directed by Miroslav Cikán
title: A Warning (film)
